com.neklo.beacon

Class SmartStoreService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.j256.ormlite.android.apptools.OrmLiteBaseService<com.neklo.beacon.db.DatabaseHelper>
            • com.neklo.beacon.SmartStoreService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconConsumer

    public class SmartStoreService
extends com.j256.ormlite.android.apptools.OrmLiteBaseService<com.neklo.beacon.db.DatabaseHelper>
implements org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconConsumer
    Background beacon service, use BeaconProcessorHelper to start it. Service load beacon and start processing automatically. Then it display notification on enter and exit beacon region.
